description: Onboard a user with personal emails

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The EFF-wide username; the part before '@eff.org' in their email

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: A beefy and highly entropic string

parameters.name: personal_email
parameters.description: Any extra email addresses they use

parameters.name: staff
parameters.description: Should they get a FAB? Defaults to true.
